summary: Provides utilities to generate cross‑sectional plots of groundwater model results, including mesh coordinate extraction, aquitard layer shading, hydraulic head contours, flow‑direction quiver arrows, and streamfunction visualizations using Matplotlib and Xarray data structures.
business_intent: Enable hydrogeologists and modelers to visually inspect and communicate subsurface flow patterns and layer properties, facilitating interpretation of simulation outputs and decision‑making in water resources projects.
